messages.title: A new A&E at Croydon University Hospital
messages.content: A new state-of-the-art Accident & Emergency Department for Croydon University Hospital.

messages.title: Get Croydon Westfield underway asap
messages.content: Ensure the Westfield Hammerson development moves forward rapidly.

messages.title: More reliable, less overcrowded trains
messages.content: Improving train services with longer trains less congested and more reliable.

messages.title: A first class working, efficient NHS
messages.content: Campaigning for better local healthcare services, including a new A&E department and better access to GP services.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Campaigning for better healthcare services including a new A&E department and better access to GPs.
Delivering fairer funding per pupil, and securing more school places.
Pushing for longer trains, first come first serve compensation system and an independent review of the franchise.
Building more homes but protecting the Green Belt.
Supporting job creation and ensuring local benefits from economic recovery.

mentions.candidate: I want to continue to represent my home town in Parliament.
mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Nick Clegg's broken promises, Ed Miliband's failure to listen, Coalition of chaos
mentions.tacticalSituation: Voting for UKIP will only help Labour here.

issues.economy: Ensuring Croydon benefits from economic recovery.
issues.education: Delivering fairer funding per pupil, and securing more school places.
issues.health: Campaigning for better healthcare services including a new A&E department.

housing.content: Building more homes but protecting the Green Belt.

leaflet.personalStatement: As your local MP, I want to continue to represent my home town.

quotes.text: He's been a really strong voice for Croydon. He's exactly the sort of person I want in my team.
quotes.source: David Cameron, Prime Minister (seen in photograph)

leaflet.additionalNotes: David Cameron's leadership has helped create more jobs and apprenticeships.
